Text: Tom Padron WeddingDear Larry Im Toms fiance I know we didnt meet yet but I need to ask you and Nancy a small favor Im preparing a small book which I will give a copy to each person Tom doesnt know anything about that One part will be for Family and Friends So what I need is some words that you want say to Tom or to the both of us on this special day If it is possivle for next weekend I will appreciate it Just send it by email Thanks and best regards Verena Do You Yahoo Obtenga su direccin de correoe gratis yahoocom en
